entry.title: Aave Proposes GHO Stablecoin
entry.summary: The GHO stablecoin would be minted by borrowing against assets locked as collateral on Aave.

entry.title: Celsius Pays Off MakerDAO Debt, Moves $500M of Bitcoin to FTX
entry.summary: Celsius has repaid its DAI loan on MakerDAO and withdrawn its WBTC collateral.

entry.title: Industry Insiders Weigh In On dYdX’s Planned AppChain
entry.summary: With V4 planned on Cosmos, experts around the industry are mulling over what dYdX’s move means for the broader crypto industry.

entry.title: Voyager Delivers Painful Lesson on Perils of Counterparty Risk in Bankruptcy Drama Exposure to Three Arrows Sinks Crypto Exchange as Dominoes Fall
entry.summary: Exposure to Three Arrows Sinks Crypto Exchange as Dominoes Fall

entry.title: MakerDAO Members Vote on Issuing $30M Loan To Societe Generale MakerDAO Embrace of Real World Assets Poised for Big Step
entry.summary: MakerDAO Embrace of Real World Assets Poised for Big Step
